notices.title: Admissions Open for 2083 BS
notices.body: We are excited to announce that admissions are now open for the upcoming academic session 2083 BS. Join GEMS for a journey of excellence.

notices.title: Dashain Holiday Notice
notices.body: Dear Parents and Students, GEMS International School will remain closed for Dashain vacation from October 6, 2026 to October 17, 2026. Classes will resume on October 18, 2026.

notices.title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
notices.body: A parent-teacher meeting has been scheduled for January 25, 2026 (Saturday) from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. Parents are requested to collect their child's progress report.

notices.title: Mid-Term Examination Schedule
notices.body: The mid-term examinations for Classes 1-10 will be held from February 1 to February 5, 2026.

notices.title: School Timings Update
notices.body: Please note that effective from January 15, 2026, the school timing will be from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
